alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 7:20AM MDT until April 20 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 4000 feet and 3 to 7 inches above, especially from Essex through Marias Pass. Most of the accumulations on paved surfaces below 4000 feet are expected during the morning hours. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
